Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement payment status tracking system

Added comprehensive payment status tracking with smart refund logic:

Database changes:
- Added PaymentStatus enum (PENDING, PAID, REFUNDED, FAILED) to Prisma schema
- Added paymentStatus field to Order model with index

Payment logic:
- COD orders: paymentStatus = PENDING (pay on delivery)
- Prepaid orders (card/momo/transfer): paymentStatus = PAID
- Completed COD orders: auto-change to PAID
- Refunded orders: auto-change to REFUNDED

Refund rules:
- PAID orders ‚Üí REFUNDING (requires admin refund processing)
- COD/PENDING orders ‚Üí CANCELLED (direct cancellation, no refund)
- Admin completes refund: REFUNDING ‚Üí CANCELLED + paymentStatus = REFUNDED

API updates (app/api/orders/[id]/route.ts):
- Check payment status before allowing REFUNDING vs CANCELLED
- Auto-update paymentStatus when admin completes refund
- Auto-mark COD as PAID when order completed

Frontend updates:
- Web orders page: smart cancel button based on payment status
- Mobile OrdersScreen: smart cancel with different messages for paid/unpaid
- Admin page: display payment status badges, auto-update on status change

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT ''Local paths'' as type, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM products WHERE thumbnail LIKE ''/uploads/%'' UNION ALL SELECT ''HTTP URLs'' as type, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM products WHERE thumbnail LIKE ''http%'' UNION ALL SELECT ''Empty/NULL'' as type, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM products WHERE thumbnail IS NULL OR thumbnail = '''';")
Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT id, userId, title, createdAt, updatedAt FROM notifications ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 10;")
Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT id, name, LEFT\(thumbnail, 80\) as thumbnail_preview FROM products ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT ''Total products'' as stat, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM products UNION ALL SELECT ''Valid thumbnails \(HTTP/HTTPS\)'', COUNT\(*\) FROM products WHERE thumbnail LIKE ''http%'' UNION ALL SELECT ''Invalid thumbnails \(local paths\)'', COUNT\(*\) FROM products WHERE thumbnail LIKE ''/uploads/%'';")

Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT ''Notifications with invalid dates'' as issue, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM notifications WHERE updatedAt IS NULL OR updatedAt = ''0000-00-00 00:00:00'' UNION ALL SELECT ''Products with invalid thumbnails'', COUNT\(*\) FROM products WHERE thumbnail NOT LIKE ''http%'' OR thumbnail IS NULL OR thumbnail = '''' UNION ALL SELECT ''Orders with missing data'', COUNT\(*\) FROM orders WHERE customerName IS NULL OR customerEmail IS NULL;")

Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT ''Products with missing SKU'' as issue, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM products WHERE sku IS NULL OR sku = '''' UNION ALL SELECT ''Products with invalid price'', COUNT\(*\) FROM products WHERE price <= 0 UNION ALL SELECT ''Products with negative stock'', COUNT\(*\) FROM products WHERE stock < 0 UNION ALL SELECT ''Products without category'', COUNT\(*\) FROM products p LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id WHERE c.id IS NULL;")

Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT id, name, SUBSTRING\(thumbnail, 1, 50\) as thumbnail_start, LENGTH\(thumbnail\) as thumb_length FROM products WHERE thumbnail LIKE ''http%'' LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT ''Total notifications'' as metric, COUNT\(*\) as value FROM notifications UNION ALL SELECT ''Read notifications'', COUNT\(*\) FROM notifications WHERE notifications.read = 1 UNION ALL SELECT ''Unread notifications'', COUNT\(*\) FROM notifications WHERE notifications.read = 0;")
Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT code, discountType, discountValue, usedCount, usageLimit, active, validFrom, validUntil FROM vouchers WHERE active = 1 LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT c.name as category, COUNT\(p.id\) as product_count FROM categories c LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY product_count DESC;")

Bash("C:\\xampp\\mysql\\bin\\mysql.exe" -u root shopqm_db -e "SELECT ''Expired password resets'' as issue, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM password_resets WHERE expiresAt < NOW\(\) UNION ALL SELECT ''Used password resets'', COUNT\(*\) FROM password_resets WHERE used = 1 UNION ALL SELECT ''Pending password resets'', COUNT\(*\) FROM password_resets WHERE used = 0 AND expiresAt > NOW\(\);")
